answers.bothHaventAnswered: Neither you nor {entity} has answered this question

ingress.withCategorySelection: The questions are divided into {numCategories} categories. You can answer all of them or the pick the ones you want. {minQuestions, plural, =0 {} =1 {} other {However, select enough categories to get at least # questions in total.}}
ingress.withoutCategorySelection: Next, answer {numQuestions} questions regarding politics and values. {numCategories, plural, =0 {} =1 {} other {The questions are divided into # categories.}}
ingress.withDynamicOrdering: Next, answer {numQuestions} questions. You can choose from multiple questions at each step.

reliability.thresholdMet: Great! You've answered enough questions to get reliable results. You can still keep answering if you want to get even more accurate results.
reliability.thresholdNotMet: Keep answering questions to reach an accuracy of at least {threshold}%. After that you can jump to matching results.
